fields.description:
- Created web services and batch file scripts to aid in collecting computer usage statistics

- Developed a report generator application for our print system administrator

Worked on Customer Relationship Management software under the user interface and locale team; exposed to the Software as a service paradigm and cloud computing and applied it to the daily duties required by my job.

  • Implemented interactive user-interface features and bug fixes
  • Algorithm design and analysis to help improve performance
  • Implemented, analyzed and improved algorithms in the realm of language and semantic processing for languages such as Turkish and Hungarian, new languages which were not yet supported by the CRM app

Hired as an intern during my last semester in college to architect and build an internal billable hour tracking tool to be used by the software engineering teams to help management track their project's billable hours.

  • The system was built with J2EE: struts 2, JSP's, JSTL, HTML and JavaScript
  • TDD using Junit and Powermock
  • Database schema design and implementation using Postgres
  • Responsible for builds and deployment to a Linux environment running Tomcat 6

Responsible for providing consulting services to clients for all aspects of the software development cycle, particularly in software architecture, design and development.

  • Developed applications for multiple clients using various platforms and programming languages: .NET, Spring/Hibernate, Force.com, and objective-c
  • Developed web services (REST and SOAP) to integrate with legacy and/or external systems
  • Constantly met with clients and business analysts to define/discuss project requirements
  • Lead software engineer on multiple client projects: i.e. Comcast, CareFirst

  • The Software development: Java, PostgreSQL, ExtJS, Maven
Graduated with a BS in Computer Science

Hired as a full time software engineer after an initial internship to work on Phillips' XIRIS (eXtended Internet Radiology Information System) which is used by healthcare facilities to optimize workflow and securely manage patient information.

  • Developed new features and fixed bugs using J2EE Components: Java, Struts, JSPs, JSTL, JavaScript
  • Highly configurable system with a database strucutre on two platforms: Postgres and Oracle
  • TDD using Junit, Powermock and Mockito; worked closely with QA to ensure quality.

Designed and developed a computer laboratory management system in which computer lab managers could manage everything related to their specific lab such as run usage reports, set availability hours, add staff , etc.

An accomplished, energetic and success oriented software developer and engineer with seven years combined academic and industry experience in object oriented design and software development, primarily with web applications and services. Proficient in various programming languages as well as database design and implementation.
A graduate from the University of Texas El Paso with a BS in Computer Science that has a focus on building APIs, web applications etc
Builds clean, responsive websites and web application interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with pre-processors and build tools like bower, gulp, npm, and webpack.
